evidence.location: Page 1: "There are no longer any such facilities... Thus, there is no longer any purpose for the Consent Decree."

evidence.text: Settlement fully incorporated into consent decree (ECF 5); no private settlement remains to enforce: "There is no longer any purpose for the Consent Decree."

The Jail has failed to provide constitutionally adequate medical care to inmates, including those with serious mental illness, in violation of the Eighth Amendment to the United States Constitution and Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973.

extracted.value: The Hampton Roads Regional Jail Authority failed to provide constitutionally adequate medical care to inmates, including those with serious mental illness, resulting in violations of the Eighth Amendment and the Rehabilitation Act.

evidence.text: Signed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 8/31/20.

This Agreement will terminate in five years, or earlier, if the Parties agree that HRRJ has attained substantial compliance with all provisions of this Agreement and maintained that compliance for a period of one year
